AbstractJsonParser<T> - Class in com.currencycloud.coolpay.json.parser
Generic abstract class which implements the parsers for the JSON objects.
AbstractJsonParser(Class<T>) - Constructor for class com.currencycloud.coolpay.json.parser.AbstractJsonParser
The constructor of the class.
AbstractMB<T,PK> - Class in com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb
This abstract class is used to implement some common functions which will be used in all forms.
AbstractMB() - Constructor for class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMB
Default constructor of the managed bean
AbstractMBList<T> - Class in com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb
This class is the abstract class base to provide common behaviour for all the list user interfaces for the entities, if necessary.
AbstractMBList() - Constructor for class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMBList
 
actionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMB
This method cancels a transaction with no changes on the system.
actionDone(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMB
This method close the transaction (conversation) and finish the process.
actionList(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.PaymentMB
This method is used to invoke the view of all the payments for a specific recipient
actionNew(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMB
Starts a transaction in order to create a new entity.
actionNew(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.PaymentMB
This method is override from the default one of the superclass, because we need an additional action, which is the recipient object in order to create a new payment entity.
actionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.PaymentMB
This method is invoked by the user interface in order to save a new payment on the system.
actionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.RecipientMB
This method is invoked by the user interface in order to save a new recipient on the system.
actionView(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMB
This method is used to show the entity, and visualise the details of it.
addMessageError(String, String) - Static method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.utils.JsfUtils
This method is used to send an error message to the user interface.
addMessageInfo(String, String) - Static method in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.utils.JsfUtils
This method is used to send a message to the user interface.
APP_DEBUGGING_PROXY - Static variable in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.json.service.BaseService
This constant defines the DebuggingProxyEnv in order to set up dynamically the system.
APP_MOCK - Static variable in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.json.service.BaseService
This constant defines the MockEnv in order to set up dynamically the system.
APP_PRODUCTION - Static variable in class com.currencycloud.coolpay.json.service.BaseService
This constant defines the ProductionEnv in order to set up dynamically the system.
